message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_EITHER_CLIENT_REFNO_OR_FIRSTNAME_LASTNAME_DOB_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Client Reference Number or Client First Name, Client Last Name, and Client Date of Birth must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CLIENT_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_NUMBER_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n, maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CASE_REFERENCE_NUMBER_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n, maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CLIENT_REFERENCE_NUMBER_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n, maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CLIENT_FIRST_NAME_NUMBER_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n, maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CLIENT_LAST_NAME_NUMBER_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n, maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_REASON_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long %1n, maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_UNITS_DELIVERED_ENTERED_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGETIVE
message.locale: 'Total units delivered' must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_ATLEAST_ONE_INFORMATION_HAS_TO_BE_CORRECTED
message.locale: At least one information has to be corrected

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_GENERATED_BY_SYSTEM_CLIENT_INFORMATION_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The roster line item was generated by the system, the client information cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_GENERATED_BY_SYSTEM_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_REF_NUMBER_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The roster line item was generated by the system, the service authorization reference number cannot be updated.
The roster line item was generated by the system, the service authorisation reference number cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_GENERATED_BY_SYSTEM_SERVICE_FROM_AND_TO_DATE_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: The roster line item was generated by the system, the Service From and Service To cannot be updated.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_STATUS_NOT_OPEN_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The roster line item correction is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_STATUS_NOT_COMPLETE_CANNOT_BE_CORRECTED
message.locale: The roster line item is '%1c', it cannot be corrected.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ONLY_ONE_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_WITH_OPEN_STATUS
message.locale: Only one roster line item correction with a status of 'Open' may exist at any given time for a roster line item.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CLIENT_FIRST_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Client First Name' must be entered if 'Client Last Name' is entered.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CLIENT_LAST_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Client Last Name' must be entered if 'Client First Name' is entered.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_NO_CLIENT_FOUND_FOR_ENTERED_DETAILS
message.locale: No unique match was found for the client details entered.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_NO_CLIENT_FOUND_FOR_REFERENCE_NUMBER
message.locale: No unique match was found for this Client Reference Number, %1s.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_INVALID_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_REFERENCE_NUMBER
message.locale: Service authorization Reference Number entered, %1s, is invalid.
Service authorisation Reference Number entered, %1s, is invalid.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_INVALID_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_CANCELED
message.locale: The service authorization matched to this roster line item, with reference number %1s, is 'Canceled'.
The service authorisation matched to this roster line item, with reference number %1s, is 'Canceled'.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_INVALID_VOUCHER_REFERENCE_NUMBER
message.locale: Voucher Number entered, %1s, is invalid.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_CLIENT_DIFFERENT_FROM_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_CLIENT
message.locale: The client authorized, %1s, is different from the client, %2s, in the roster line item.
The client authorised, %1s, is different from the client, %2s, in the roster line item.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_NO_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_LINE_ITEM_MATCHED
message.locale: No service authorization line item could be matched to this roster line item.
No service authorisation line item could be matched to this roster line item.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_DELIVERED_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_AUTHORIZED_UNITS
message.locale: The number of units, %1n, must be less than or equal to the number of units authorized, %2n.
The number of units, %1n, must be less than or equal to the number of units authorised, %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_THIS_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_IS_NOT_PENDINGAPPROVAL_IT_CANNOT_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: This roster line item correction is not 'Pending Approval', it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_THIS_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_IS_NOT_PENDINGAPPROVAL_IT_CANNOT_BE_DENIED
message.locale: This roster line item correction is not 'Pending Approval', it cannot be denied.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_THIS_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CANNOT_BE_SUBMITTED_FOR_PROCESSING
message.locale: This roster line item correction is not 'Open', it cannot be submitted for processing.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_THIS_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_IS_NOT_OPEN_IT_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This roster line item correction is not 'Open', it cannot be deleted.
This roster line item correction is not 'Open', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_THIS_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_IS_NOT_COMPLETE_CANNOT_BE_CORRECTED
message.locale: This roster line item is not 'Complete', it cannot be corrected.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_FV_CORRECTION_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Correction Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ABSENCE_REASON_ALREADY_PRESENT_FOR_DATE
message.locale: This Absence reason, '%1s' already exists.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_MUST_HAVE_ONE_DAY_DAILY_ATTENDANCE
message.locale: Roster line item(s)correction must have daily attendance added for at least one day in the period between Service From and Service To dates.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ACTUAL_UNITS_NOT_EQUAL_TO_SUM_OF_UNITS_ATTENDED_FOR_EACH_DAY
message.locale: Actual Units, %1n, for the corrected roster line item must be equal to the sum of Units Attended for each day.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_SUM_OF_UNITS_NOT_ATTENDED_NOT_EQUAL_TO_DIFFERENCE_BETWEEN_EXPECTED_UNITS_AND_ACTUAL_UNITS
message.locale: The sum of Units Not attended must be equal to the difference between Expected Units, %1n , and Actual Units, %2n.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ACTUAL_UNITS_LESS_THAN_EXPECTED_UNITS_ABSENCE_REASONS_MUST_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The Actual Units, %1n, are less than the Expected Units, %2n, roster line item correction must have absence reasons added.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_ACTUAL_UNITS_NOT_LESS_THAN_EXPECTED_UNITS_ABSENCE_REASONS_CANNOT_BE_ADDED
message.locale: The Actual Units, %1n, are not less than the Expected Units, %2n, absence reasons cannot be added.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_NO_CHANGE_DURING_CORRECTION_CANNOT_BE_SUBMITTED_FOR_APPROVAL
message.locale: The roster line item correction does not contain any information which is different from the original roster line item and related daily attendance/absence details, it cannot be submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_ACTUAL_UNITS_ENTERED_GREATER_THAN_AUTHORIZED_UNIT_REMAINING
message.locale: The actual units entered are greater than the number of authorized units remaining.
The actual units entered are greater than the number of authorised units remaining.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_PROVIDER_DOESNOT_PROVIDE_SERVICE_FOR_PERIOD
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide the service, %2s, for the period specified in the roster line item.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_PROVIDER_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, is not 'Approved'.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: The provider service , %1s, is not 'Approved'.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_SERVICE_AUTHORIZATION_COULD_NOT_BE_FOUND
message.locale: No service authorization could be found for the roster line item.
No service authorisation could be found for the roster line item.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_XRV_CORRECTION_DAILY_ATTENDANCE_REQ_AND_ATTENDANCE_TRACKING_IND_CHANGED_IN_DELIVERY_PERIOD
message.locale: The 'Attendance Tracking Enabled' and 'Daily Attendance Required' indicators have changed effective from, %1d, which falls within the service delivery period.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_XRV_CORRECTION_ATTENDANCE_TRACKING_IND_CHANGED_IN_DELIVERY_PERIOD
message.locale: The 'Attendance Tracking Enabled' indicator has changed effective from, %1d, which falls within the service delivery period.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_XRV_CORRECTION_DAILY_ATTENDANCE_REQ_IND_CHANGED_IN_DELIVERY_PERIOD
message.locale: The 'Daily Attendance Required' indicator has changed effective from, %1d, which falls within the service delivery period.

message.name: ERR_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM_CORRECTION_XRV_CASE_DIFFERENT_FROM_SA_CASE
message.locale: The case authorized, %1s, is different from the case, %2s, in the roster line item.
The case authorised, %1s, is different from the case, %2s, in the roster line item.
